Sentencas: A novel plasma-matrix reformer (PMR) was suggested for methane conversion into hydrogen-rich fuel.
Titulo: Development of a Combined Plasma-Matrix Reformer for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: To demonstrate the possibility of reforming performance, characteristics of product gas and CH4 conversion were identified according to O-2/C ratio, water vapor supply, reformed gas recirculation, and water feed in the recirculation gas affecting energy conversion and hydrogen production.
Titulo: Development of a Combined Plasma-Matrix Reformer for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: When the reformed gas recirculation and water feed to the recirculation pipe were performed at the same time, hydrogen production and energy conversion efficiency were superior compared to the conventional reforming method.
Titulo: Development of a Combined Plasma-Matrix Reformer for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: The optimal operating conditions of the PMR were determined.
Titulo: Development of a Combined Plasma-Matrix Reformer for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: The obtained high energy conversion efficiency and hydrogen selectivity indicated the applicability to solid oxide fuel cell stacks for residential power generation.
Titulo: Development of a Combined Plasma-Matrix Reformer for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application
